frontend/src/constants/profileOptions.ts: Lists predefined interests and perspectives for profile and onboarding flows.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, moments, challenges, and global stats via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, defines extensive light/dark theme color variables, and adds custom glass-card and button component styles.

frontend/src/pages/DailyChallengesPage.t: Loads and displays daily challenges with streak tracking and completion actions, falling back to defaults when needed.
frontend/src/pages/DebateRoomsPage.tsx: Shows a list of debate rooms and a detailed room view with guidelines and hand-raising functionality.
frontend/src/pages/EmotionalSafetyPage.t: Presents information about AI-guided emotional safety features including reflection, toxicity prevention, and distress support.
frontend/src/pages/GlobalChartPage.tsx: Fetches and displays global community stats with map visuals and metric cards.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows user profile and navigation tiles linking to key app sections.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Provides a hero section with app vision and login/start flow for new or returning users.
frontend/src/pages/MatchingPage.tsx: Displays mock match data with compatibility metrics and selectable connection modes.
